text: Nina's Paris is a French luxury fragrances and tea brand established in 1672 by Pierre Diaz.http://ninasparis.com/en/about/ Originally a distillerie serving the Court of Versailles during the reign of king Louis XIV, it later became a tea and patisserie company under Nina Diaz. Its tea aromas source from the King's Kitchen's Garden in the Castle of Versailles, France. ==References== Category:Companies established in 1672 Category:Fragrance companies Category:Tea companies of France Category:Pâtisserie Category:Cosmetics companies of France
title: Nina's Paris
